description: Defines data models for a food delivery app, including User, Hotel, MenuItem, CartItem, and Order classes, with JSON serialization/deserialization methods.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Represents a user with id, email, and optional name, including methods for JSON serialization.

classes.name: Hotel
classes.description: Represents a hotel with details and a list of menu items, including JSON serialization methods.

classes.name: MenuItem
classes.description: Represents a menu item with id, name, optional description, and price, along with JSON serialization methods.

classes.name: CartItem
classes.description: Represents an item in the shopping cart, including quantity and total price calculation.

classes.name: Order
classes.description: Represents an order with id, list of cart items, status, and total cost, including JSON serialization.

methods.name: User.fromJson
methods.description: Creates a User instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: User.toJson
methods.description: Serializes User instance to a JSON map.

methods.name: Hotel.fromJson
methods.description: Creates a Hotel instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: MenuItem.fromJson
methods.description: Creates a MenuItem instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: Order.fromJson
methods.description: Creates an Order instance from a JSON map.
